title: Plants and Air Purifiers
description: A short lesson to help you apply Plants and Air Purifiers.

hook.text: NASA once claimed houseplants purify indoor air. The internet ran with it. It was overstated.

buildup.text: Plants do absorb some VOCs â€” but only in sealed lab chambers, not in real rooms.

discovery.text: You would need hundreds of plants per room to match even a small air purifier.

twist.text: HEPA air purifiers capture 99.97% of particles 0.3 micrometers and larger.

climax.text: The best indoor air strategy combines ventilation, source control, and filtration.

punchline.text: Plants look nice. Purifiers actually clean the air.
